org.dynalang.dynalink

Class DefaultBootstrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dynalang.dynalink.DefaultBootstrapper

  • public class DefaultBootstrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience default bootstrapper that exposes a static bootstrap method to which language runtimes that need the very default behavior can use with minimal setup. When first referenced, it will create a dynamic linker with default settings for the DynamicLinkerFactory, and its bootstrap method will create MonomorphicCallSite for all call sites.
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    Attila Szegedi

    • Method Detail

      • bootstrap

        public static java.lang.invoke.CallSite bootstrap(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup caller,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.invoke.MethodType type)
        Use this method as your bootstrap method (see the documentation of the java.lang.invoke package for how to do this).
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller's lookup
        name - the name of the method at the call site
        type - the method signature at the call site
        Returns:
        a new MonomorphicCallSite linked with the default dynamic linker.
